summary:
Always thought that you, the special and only Dovakiin from this age. Didn\\\'t had a priest mask?
Well this Mod simply add\\\'s a Dovakiin Mask to the main quest, wich can be found in the blades skytemple.
descriptionHtml:
Always thought that you, the special and only Dovakiin from this age. Didn\'t had a priest mask?
Well this Mod simply add\'s a Dovakiin Mask to the main quest, wich can be found in the blades skytemple.

You can find the Dovakiin\'s Mask at Alduin\'s wall
Now the special dragonborn finaly has his own mask.
The mask removes time between shouting, but only if you wear it.

(This is made for rollplayers like me)
At first i made it for my own, because i liked the idea of my own mask.

For Roleplayers.
History:
The blades putted their hands on the first Mask slain from the first dragon priest.
from that time, it has been passed on from Dragonborn till Dragonborn
author: Dragonsnitch
